website_summaries.verdict: While it has good sound when it works, many of these CD players either don't work upon arrival or break shortly thereafter.
pros: Good basic features if you only want to play CDs
cons: It might work or it might not

customer_reviews.title: I have multiple CD's that I have purchased from Amazon through the years and I cannot enjoy the music because I have no working CD player
customer_reviews.text: This device does not play. At my age (82) it's too hard to return it. I bought two more. Neither of them will play. I have multiple CD's that I have purchased from Amazon through the years and I cannot enjoy the music because I have no working CD player. I bought the least expensive ones because I really couldn't afford to buy any at all. Listening to music is my biggest pleasure and now I can't have it. I gave it one star since there isn't an option for no stars. I am hopeful that Amazon or whatever other sellers are involved will see fit to correct this problem and provide me with a CD player that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Lovett

customer_reviews.title: I should have tried it out before giving as a gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday, which was recently, and my mistake was not to open the package to check on the item I ordered. Way too late to return, but it was broken from the start. It played 3 seconds of music that I hear an audible click and it stopped. I tried wiggling the new batteries I put in..that did not help. A plug did not help either. The CD spins, but tha's it. So, do not be like me, check it out even if it is a gift before you get embarrassed. I had read awful reviews about GPX, but decided to give them a chance..Wrong!
customer_reviews.author: lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing I can say is that it was cheap. The cover for the batteries doesn't stay closed so I had to put tape on it. It stops in the middle of the track for no reason and it eats batteries faster then any other portable player I have ever had. I use portable players for books on CDs so I have been through many and this is the poorest quality I have had. Don't waste your money, pay a little more and get one that's a little better
customer_reviews.author: Gina Brendley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I listen to books on tape by the hour when I am working in the shop or garden so am very rough on it. Has not faltered
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work on playing a cd it keep turning off after 10 seconds. It was a cheap price but I wish it would at least play a cd.
customer_reviews.author: Marine1USMC

customer_reviews.title: Another DOA
customer_reviews.text: It was posted as last one seller had & there were a lot of reviews about the item being DOA, but I figured there had to be a small chance of that happening to me. Wrong, DOA. Have to return. Thank goodness I bought another one at about the same time. I hate working outside all day without listening to books. I tried with 7 different sets of batteries, but no go.
customer_reviews.author: chimneygirl1982

customer_reviews.title: CD Player Dud
customer_reviews.text: This portable cd player is terrible. It goes through batteries at an uncanny rate, and seems to slow down and speed up on certain song selections. Also, since there is no provision for an aux. out cable, the music can only be heard on the very low quality ear plugs that the unit comes with. A poor investment, but one that I am sure my scavenging neighbor will appreciate when he finds it at the bottom of the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: shultho

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing about it is the writing for play/fast forward/stop
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap enough to try it based on the reviews I read. The only bad thing about it is the writing for play/fast forward/stop, etc. Are all dark, making it very difficult to read. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality was good, however went through batteries very 3 time we ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for me and one for my daughter to listen to meditation tapes. the sound quality was good, however went through batteries very 3 time we played the tape. then both of them just stopped working. I wanted to return them, but it was past my return date. These are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *Arrived Defective*
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this CD player for my mother. It arrived today already opened with a post it note that says "defective". Really??? Who does that? (I would have given this product zero stars but that wasn't an option.)
customer_reviews.author: 24Lang

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS GARBAGE. I bought 2 units. The first lasted a month till it quit. Then tried to use the second one, it was DOA. BEWARE. Seller for warranty then wants it shipped back to them, with original packaging....Really??? NOT prepaid for replacement. Shipping costs more than the unit is worth. DONT DO IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sniper

customer_reviews.title: Functions great but with one major sacrifice!
customer_reviews.text: Pros; Works as expected Awesome battery life/ long usage time (I've easily used this for at least 6 or so hours since March and I'm still using the same pair of batteries) Hasn't scratched my CD's or skipped tracks while moving around with it Cons; CONSTANTLY makes sounds while listening to music! Even when perfectly still or having this rest on a flat surface... ruins experience!
customer_reviews.author: Tasker Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works really good and I was surprised to see it in packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really good and I was surprised to see it in packaging being it was used. But it was a nice surprise. So far no skipping out scratching. My teenager is now into CD with his friends so it was nice finding a good priced CD player
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: If you order this, make sure to test it right away
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this several months ago. Unfortunately, I didn't try to use it until a few days ago. It played the first disc of an audio book for me, and then it stopped working. No, the batteries are not dead. It just doesn't work properly. It won't play correctly and it shuts itself off. I tried music discs, I tried everything. This is a defective piece of electronics. I missed the return window. Don't let this happen to you!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: It broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Boy did this go through battery life fast! I got it to listen to books on cd with an auxiliary Bose speaker. At first it was great until I started going through the batteries. So....I bought an ac adapter and first try the little adapter port pin fell back into the machine never to be seen again. Player sucked, but Amazon Prime did not! No hassle refund and I bought a better grade which I should have done in the first place. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: terri b

customer_reviews.title: Skips every 60 seconds. Crap!
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old bought this. It has a sixty second anti-skip protection built in. So what that means is it won’t skip for the duration of 60 seconds, but once that 60 seconds is up, it will skip without fail. Every CD he put in it to listen to would skip every sixth seconds. This thing is a piece of crap!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: please have ups to pick up never worke stops scratched cd
customer_reviews.text: please have ups pick it up aweful skips scarched cd
customer_reviews.author: joy marie kitinos gruver

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CD player because I wanted to use it when I travel. It did arrive within the two days as promised. When I opened it, the CD player looked used and it did not work. My trip was to be the following day and customer service could not give me another one in time. I am requesting a refund. I do not recommend this product. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tamia

customer_reviews.title: CD PLAYER
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this CD player to play with my bose speaker in my car. but it would not work work and so I have not used it. I will though, when I'm in my room Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I want it to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could listen to books on CD from the library on my daily commute. I dont like the headphones, but I planned on using my own anyway. The walkman works great! Even after accidentally dropping it on the floor twice (batteries fell out and everything) it still works perfectly! If you're looking for an inexpensive product to use like I was, this is a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Missmusic225

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my four year old daughter. I usually always read reviews but unfortunately this time I didn't. I just went for the cheap price. This worked great for about 30 minutes. And then the cd stopped spinning. The display still worked. I even changed batteries. And then I went to the reviews and apparently other people have experienced the same issue along with a few others. Do not waste your money! I'm returning ours.
customer_reviews.author: KOwen

customer_reviews.title: No Problems With This Player
customer_reviews.text: If you want an affordable cd player, this is it. No fancy features. Nice design. Plays those cd disks for those of us who have just arisen to this level of technology, but still have an answering machine that uses a cassette tape.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Salniker

customer_reviews.title: for the price not bad.
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are not too good. I lucked out finding an old headset. So if you have a decent headset it sounds pretty good. I had no idea that a good headset really make it sound good. I haven't had it for a long time, about a week, so I cannot comment on battery life. I have a battery charger that has sure come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery burner
customer_reviews.text: We wanted an inexpensive CD player for background use. Initially, we thought this was broken because it would shutoff after 60 seconds. We finally realized that it would do this when it detected low battery power.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cumpian

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one; it will never work!
customer_reviews.text: It never worked. It automatically turns off when you turn it on. I tried it for about a half hour after reading the directions and finally gave up. It will not stay "ON"; it automatically shuts off before a single note from the CD is heard. It did not come with the return address or postage that comes with some products and I don't know where to send it or don't want to waste more money trying to mail it back.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Suttman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: No skipping, batteries last reasonable amount of time and sound in excellent with good headphones. Wish they would produce one that is bluetooth capable. I can play all my Motown music w/o "disturbing" anyone else !!!
customer_reviews.author: N J in Texas

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in perfect condition. Put in the batteries it works fine
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this because I wanted to hear my cds whenever I wanted to. It arrived in perfect condition. Put in the batteries it works fine. My problem with it... it is so cheaply made. It is plastic and you know if u drop it by accident poof broken. Handle it with kid gloves. I miss back in my day when cd players were everywhere and they were made so much better. Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Useless purchase and much regretted
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish and a total waste of money. It won’t play any of my large collection of CDs and that leaves me feeling very frustrated. Really wish I had never ordered this piece of ****
customer_reviews.author: Je suis Charlie

customer_reviews.title: portable cd
customer_reviews.text: great little economical cd player- no tone or base control but sound is adequate- for the price you cannot beat it-- would be nice if it came with a charger.. should have been included do this reason... rating is lower as non complete unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with standard 4.5V power supply connectors and failed after eight months
customer_reviews.text: The large number of negative reviews concerning battery life didn't dissuade me because I use a power supply -- or would if the darned DC power connector socket was the right size. I haven't decided whether it's worth the hassle to return it. Update: failed after eight months of once a week usage!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed to find that the CD player was faulty
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to find that the CD player was faulty. It would only play if I put pressure on and held down the "play" button. The minute I took my finger off, the disc just skipped all over the place.None of the other buttons worked either. "Caveat-emptor." I should have read the reviews before ordering.One buyer said, "you get what you pay for," however I don't like paying for something that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: GmaJ

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 times!
customer_reviews.text: This CD player had great sound and was easy to use but broke after 2 times of use. That’s completely ridiculous. The batteries still work to power it up but the cd will not play inside. Unfortunately we didn’t use it immediately when it arrived so I was outside of the return time frame otherwise it would have been sent back. I would give 0 stars if I could. Very disappointing. Wish I could get my $$ back and get another one because I need a portable CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Zapata

customer_reviews.title: It skips.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to listen to music CDs while I work in my basement or garage. It skips. At first, I thought it might be a bad CD, but it skips on all of them. I did not have great expectations of sound quality, but I did expect it to function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Clemmer

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but definitely not great
customer_reviews.text: No remote control. Sounds okay for an older machine. If you tilt it at all it stops playing which is difficult since I got it for my four and six year olds to listen to books. If they move it at all it stops playing and turns off which frustrates them and me.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but if you use regularly I'd go for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It's good for the price. It's a pretty cheap plastic and can be easily broken, but it's not that terrible considered the price. I did notice on mine, when I pause it skips the track I was paused on. I have to skip forward and then skip back again to listen to the track properly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Hard to run!
customer_reviews.text: I orderd TWO of these....on came in silver....plays like a dream....the other was this black THING! Very hard to OPEN to change discs Just not near as good as the "silver one"! Sure am glad they didn't send me 2 black ones!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cheap cd player to hook to a sound system until you can afford a nicer one. DO NOT buy this used/like new. I bought one used from Amazon Warehouse and it didn't work, had them replace it w/ a second and it didn't work either. Not worth saving just a few bucks off a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: JCLSmithWV

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY FOR "OLD TIME" TECHNOLOGY
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound and quality. Nice when the lights go out or someplace you don't want to have ipods hanging off your body. If you grew up with these, it will be nostalgia, plus. Excellent price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Darsen

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I tested it and it played just fine. Day #2 it worked for five minutes. I changed the batteries and tried to use a different set of ear buds with no luck. The CD was spinning but no sound could be heard. I guess it's true you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Z. J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I won’t be buying a product that doesn’t work again at least not this product or his company
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of not looking at the time that I had the product the product never worked and I was in and out of the hospital at the time so it was a waste of money and time and I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Velez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn’t even get through the first CD without stopping. It just stops. If you try to restart it. It stops again. Useless. Sending it back. If I could have given it no stars I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Davis

customer_reviews.title: More instructions please!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this CD player for approximately a month and still cannot figure out how to play it. Neither can my tech-savy son. The less than one-page instructions were useless and I could find nothing anymore helpful online. Wish I had never purchased it. Should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far,  so good...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, brilliant and clear. I use it w/adapter as part of a mini-system. No bass boost, but I I'm running it through an amp out the headphones port. Easy to program; no resume feature. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: P ski

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I get that CD players aren't cool, but reading is! We like to get books on CD from the library and read along on car trips. It skips more than I think it should, but it gets the job done. The owner is a 6 year old and its keeping up with her handling and storage and use of it. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Koprek

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the gate, the battery compartment would not stay closed and the whole thing wobbles when it's on. It is only my laziness that prevented me from returning it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Owen

customer_reviews.title: Nice CD player and the price was right.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a CD player to listen to audio books. This is worked good for that. The price was good, it didn’t skip, and the sound was good. I can’t complain. I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. L .

customer_reviews.title: Completely unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I played one cd disc - the next disc I played cut out, wouldn't play. Tried with other discs, same result. A completely unreliable product. You get what you pay for - unless you luck out.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hassett

customer_reviews.title: The volume level resets when the player is turned off ...
customer_reviews.text: The volume level resets when the player is turned off and then back on; I would prefer it remaining as I left it, but it's a minor inconvenience that prevents giving five stars, along with the programming mode not being straightforward. The unit is solidly built and plays perfectly, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Broken, minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after using it 4 times 30 minutes of use each time. Difficult to get my hand under the hood to get the cd out. Earphone are uncomfortable with no padding and to large for my ears.
customer_reviews.author: doreen

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to buy a jumbo pack of batteries
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it plays about 4 songs on a CD and it kills the battery. My daughter tried using it for three days in a row and went through 6 batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Easy to Use CD Player
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cd players to replace older players in my first grade class' listening center. They are durable enough to withstand six and seven year olds. The battery life is pretty good as I consider how often they are used. They are uncomplicated to use. As my older cd players wear out, I will definitely replace them with these!
customer_reviews.author: ELaw

customer_reviews.title: For the car
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get a usb headphone cable to work in car. Also does not come with a charge cord works on battery The player is small easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.author: randall gredlein

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: this product was not at all what I expected. I returned it.The majority of my purchases from Amazon have been great but this one was not, I retuned it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: movie lover

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good item
customer_reviews.text: Hard to read since all writing is in black on a black case. Comes without power cord to play without batteries . Returning item!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rubens, Janine Rubens

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Got for grandpa who has dementia. Listening to his oldies calms him down. So we got him a new one grandma doesn't have to tape together.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Combs-Strickland

customer_reviews.title: It had to play with headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the player as I couldn't just set it In the car and play CD's. It had to have a speaker hooked to it.
customer_reviews.author: Neater

customer_reviews.title: no skip / plays nice/  sound is very good  /
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I ride because I have so many disks with the music that I love.use the buds that go in the ear does.nt interfear with helmet.finger prints are going to get on it LOL
customer_reviews.author: Bubacat

customer_reviews.title: No info about needing an AC-DC adapter, not which one should be purchasd. ?????
customer_reviews.text: No mention that an AC-DC adapter was required. I don't know anything about them and do not know which one I should order for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edna L. King-Miller

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: CD player plays for a couple seconds, and then immediately stops playing. The sound quality is also horrible and not worth the money at all. Extremely inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Will not play MP3 disc
customer_reviews.text: Will not play MP3 disc. Even factory made CD's of MP3 files. Not a disc that I made on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: Kinda SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cheap I should have listened to the bad reviews. Its very glitchy and you have to press the buttons like 5 times for it to finally do what you want it to do and you cannot move it one bit because it will stop playing and it doe not hold your place on the disc. Horrible product I should have returned it while I could.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: It works fine when my wife is home working in the garden
customer_reviews.text: My wifes car did not come with a cd player and we were going on a trip. I got this so she could listen to her books on cd. Even though we were on a highway the light bumps were to much for this player and it was constantly stopped trying to recover from "skips". It works fine when my wife is home working in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I can't believe we used to pay hundreds for a portable CD player, or can't believe they can make it, sell it, and make a profit for under $20.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I use this player to listen to audio books in the gym and usually don't listen to a whole CD at one time. The previous CD player I had that got broken had a simple hold button to push to save your place in a story. This one does not and the process for finding your place again is awkward and time consuming. It took me several tries to figure out how to do it.The buttons on the player are also poorly marked and hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Why the heckdoesn't this come with cables?
customer_reviews.text: Why is this CD player sold without ANY OF THE CABLES THAT WOULD LET YOU ATTACH IT TO ANY MODERN DEVICE?
customer_reviews.author: The Dark Lord

customer_reviews.title: Mom totally love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom to listen to her “Cher & Like a Rock song” that I was plagued with driving anywhere as it was on repeat. She issues this while walking around the neighborhood to keep her old muscles from locking up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Not totally great
customer_reviews.text: Unless you take time to remove at least one battery, you'll be buying more almost every day. Also, it's really touchy in playing cds both ones I've had and brand new cds.
customer_reviews.author: JM G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when this product arrived. It was my first purchase of a portable CD player. Imagine my disappoint ment when it stopped working after a few minutes! I had to return it which was an easy process. I just wish the player was that good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S. Purser

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I went old school and bought this portable CD player to use on my trip. Great price and easy to use. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I was looking for. My father in law loves his CD PLAYER! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melynda Onusaitis

customer_reviews.title: Needed a backup
customer_reviews.text: Bought for car since radio system died out and all I had in car was cds. This is perfect
customer_reviews.author: MikeAng07

customer_reviews.title: GPX PORTABLE CD player
customer_reviews.text: So far this player meet all the requirements I need. I would recommend it a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mira Bourne

customer_reviews.title: great start - failed too soon
customer_reviews.text: thought this would be an easy to use option - writing on operation buttons is very small - but easy to guess. problem was that after less than a dozen uses it stopped working, just after I used the skip function for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur K. Tsuchiya

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I send this product back immediately as the CD skipped even on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: JUST a cd player
customer_reviews.text: NO stupid fm radio that you don’t even need on a cd player, and therefore no way to leave on the radio you weren’t even listening to and run the batteries down overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great device, long lasting and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great playing device. Loud for good music. Any music, really. The device lasted nearly four days with a couple batteries. A few buttons in terms of ease.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Olinger

customer_reviews.title: Glad they still make these!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my car trips since none in vehicle! My grandkids love it too, keeps them occupied and they have their own earbuds for their visits.
customer_reviews.author: Aptsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, it stopped working about 2 months after I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: It was fine at first, but then it would randomly stop. Then the stopping got more and more frequent. Finally, it stopped and wouldn’t start again no matter what I did. Too bad, I really enjoyed the sound quality etc.
customer_reviews.author: Design Purist

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute piece of junk. Received it and verified its was working. Then left on a month long trip with the intent to use the player for books on tape. Arrived and the damn thing does not work
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: This cd player is junk. I bought two of these for work. My wife and i listen to books the entire time we are at work. These didnt last two months. I wouldnt waste my money on these ever again. I just threw the second one away today.... junk...
customer_reviews.author: Heather & Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: wrong batteries
customer_reviews.text: They need to work on quality control .The wrong batteries were sent
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Messy Mary

customer_reviews.title: Probably is a great item but the one my brother got was defective.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my brother as a gift. He said it played for two days and now all it does it whir and click.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: It’s small but being so late it’s hard for things not to work right.OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s small but being so late it’s hard for things not to work right.
customer_reviews.author: nancyjoan

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Like the affordably, sound quality is good,relaxing to music,love it
customer_reviews.author: norma hanford

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it but she did say that one side of the earphones went out already.
customer_reviews.author: RV Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered two of these, and Both are ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of these, and Both are faulty!!! Not one sound will come out or be generated from this device!! I only paid for the one, but when the second one came, it did the exact same thing as the first - spin wildly and won't keep a sound😭
customer_reviews.author: Richard Emtage

customer_reviews.title: quit to soon
customer_reviews.text: Totally quit playing cd in less than a year of light use, dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: angler

customer_reviews.title: 25% defective players!!!  Am I getting other customer’s returns of defective unit?
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 15 player I bought were defective. 25% Defective rate is beyond imagination. I am very surprise that this CD player can still survive in the competitive market.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: Think this works fine and I see no issues with it. I'm using rechargeable batteries and there is no issue
customer_reviews.author: Renee Howard

customer_reviews.title: only temporary
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for awhile, then quit working. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Gave it away
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Gave it to goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Latch broken
customer_reviews.text: It plays cds in my car, but you cannot eject the cd with the button. The button does nothing and you have to pull it open with your hands to change cds.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The unit played 15 minutes of the first CD. I paused the playback for a few minutes and was unable to get it to play again. It would spin the disc for about 5 seconds and then shut down. Its not worth the trouble to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: works well!
customer_reviews.text: haven't had any issues with this player. It is great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one use
customer_reviews.text: Are use this once and it broke mediately just stop working
customer_reviews.author: Mia Farland

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Love listening to music/Preaching when I walk. Keeps me from getting bored!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: my wife uses the player many times a day while she is recovering from surgery
customer_reviews.author: GARY FOSTER

customer_reviews.title: Died after third use
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of CD's played just fine, then every one thereafter skipped constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: IF IT WORKED
customer_reviews.text: TRIED THE CD PLAYER THE NIGHT I REC'D IT, WORKED OKAY. WHEN I WENT TO USE IT ON MY VACATION IT WOULD ONLY PLAY FOR A FEW MINUTES. IT WOULD SHUT ITSELF OFF... TRIED GETTING IN TOUCH WITH THE SELLER, BUT GOT NO RESPONSE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: So, So
customer_reviews.text: I never got to use had to return due to it not working.
customer_reviews.author: Hoop 4

product_meta.title: GPX PC301B Portable CD Player with Stereo Earbuds and Anti-Skip Protection (PC301B),Black
product_meta.description: Style:Single| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingGPX's PC301B Portable CD Player offers all the standard playback features you would expect, including play, pause, skip forward/back, program, mode and stop. The LCD display shows you which track number is playing, so you can easily skip songs if desired. With rotary volume control and a stereo headphone jack, the PC301B is perfect for taking to the beach, study hall, home or work. The 60 second anti-skip protection keeps your music in memory providing shock-resistant, uninterrupted music playback, so you don't need to worry about walking around with your CD player. A low battery indicator shows you when the 2 AA batteries (sold separately) need to be changed, making sure your music listening is not interrupted. It can also run on external power adaptor (sold separately). So you can get started listening right away, one set of stereo earbuds are included in the package with the CD player. For more than 30 years, GPX has offered one of the broadest portfolios of technology-driven consumer audio and video products. An award-winning consumer electronics company, GPX has built a solid reputation on excellent product quality, reliability, design, and affordability.
feature_bullets: Portable personal CD player with 60 second anti-skip protection
1 pair of stereo ear buds included
Stereo headphone jack with rotary volume control
LCD display with low power indicator
Runs on 2 AA batteries or external power adaptor (both sold separately)
